summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCeraVe Oil Control Moisturizing Gel-Cream helps absorb excess oil for all day hydration and shine control. For combination to oily skin, this face moisturizer helps rebalance skin, leaving it neither too oily nor too dry, and quickly absorbs into skin with a matte finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsHelps absorb excess oil for all day hydration and shine controlFormulated for combination to oily skinHelps rebalance skin, leaving it neither too oily nor too dry.Formulated with an oil-absorbing technology with silica and other powders plus ceramides and moisturizing ingredients like hyaluronic acid and niacinamideNon-greasy formula feels refreshing upon application and quickly absorbs into skin with a matte finish. Over time, pores appear reduced.Gentle on skin, non-comedogenic, fragrance-free, paraben-free, and oil-freeSuitable for use under makeup without pillingSafe for sensitive skin, oily skin, and as a moisturizer for acne prone skinDeveloped with dermatologists, CeraVe is the #1 Dermatologist Recommended Skin Care BrandKey IngredientsOil-Absorbing Technology: Formulated with silica and other powders to help absorb excess oil and rebalance oily skin, leaving it neither too oily nor too dryHyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin‚Äôs surface and helps the skin retain moistureNiacinamide: Helps calm the skinMVE Technology delivers hydration throughout the dayCeramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin‚Äôs natural barrierFormulated WithoutFragranceOilParabensItem 2625703How To UseUse moisturizer as the last step in AM & PM routines.If layering with an eye cream, moisturizer or facial serum, apply this oil absorbing moisturizer after other product applications have been fully absorbed.Unlock the pump for first time use by twisting it to the left and pressing down several times until the product comes out. Note: You may actually have to press down on the pump as many as 10-20 times for the product to initially begin dispensing lotion.After using a cleanser like CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser, apply liberally to face and neck daily or as directed by a physician.Precautions: Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Cetearyl Isononanoate, C14-22 Alcohols, Isopropyl Myristate, Zea Mays Starch / Corn Starch, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Eop, Carbomer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Triethyl Citrate, Silica, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Xanthan Gum, Phytosphingosine, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Benzoic Acid, C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside.
how_to_use: Use moisturizer as the last step in AM & PM routines.If layering with an eye cream, moisturizer or facial serum, apply this oil absorbing moisturizer after other product applications have been fully absorbed.Unlock the pump for first time use by twisting it to the left and pressing down several times until the product comes out. Note: You may actually have to press down on the pump as many as 10-20 times for the product to initially begin dispensing lotion.After using a cleanser like CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser, apply liberally to face and neck daily or as directed by a physician.Precautions: Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.

reviews.headline: Love this moisturizer
reviews.comments: I love this moisturizer! Leaves my skin feeling clean and hydrated!

reviews.headline: Face full of acne
reviews.comments:
I loved this product because it significantly decreased how oily my T-Zone would get throughout the day, therefore making my makeup way less patchy and from sliding off during an 8 hour shift. However, it has broken me out ALL over my face but specifically on my nose and chin!! It has been over a week of having the same areas get reoccuring white-heads!

If you do not have acne-prone skin, this would be great.. but as thats something I struggle with and am sensitive to, this product is a nightmare.

reviews.headline: Love this moisturizer
reviews.comments: I really love this moisturizer due to how light weight and hydrating it is on my skin. And I love that this moisturizer is also non greasy.

reviews.headline: Works for me!
reviews.comments: I am also surprised to see more negative than positive reviews. The oil control works for me. I'm sure it would be even better if I drank more water lol

reviews.headline: Broke me out!
reviews.comments:
Skin Type: Oily, Sensitive

I bought this for my very oily skin and sadly it broke me out all over my cheeks. I usually use the AM/PM CeraVe moisturizers and those are amazing but this one did not work for me. It controlled my oiliness for sure but left me with severe breakouts that im now trying to get rid of.

reviews.headline: Does what it says!!
reviews.comments: I have acne-prone, oily skin, and I am surprised by the mixed reviews on this product. It worked wonders for me by controlling my oil while still providing hydration. Cerave, please don't discontinue this product.

reviews.headline: Unhappy
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this product but it broke me out.  It does hydrate but no matter when I use it, it breaks me out.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again
reviews.comments: I bought this product hoping that it would help me control my oily skin, and I felt like it made my skin more oily. Also, the pump on my bottle does not work, so that was not a plus either.

reviews.headline: Reverse affect on oily skin
reviews.comments: This made my skin feel dewy, tacky after 1hr of absorbing into skin. I have an oily t zone, but my forehead isnt quiet as oily.

reviews.headline: Oil control, sure‚Ä¶ but at what cost?
reviews.comments: I wanted so badly to love this, not just because its CeraVe but also because I'm super oily seemingly no matter what I do, but I don't know if this is the solution. My oiliness is controlled, yes, but I've not had blackheads and bumps like this since first entering puberty and periods. I'm probably going to return this, unfortunately.

reviews.headline: wanted to love it
reviews.comments: The first time I tried this moisturizer, I loved it. It soaked into my skin beautifully, didn't leave a film, and didn't make me feel oily in hot/humid weather. However, after using it for about 2 weeks I find my skin burns when I use it and just looks congested with little bumps.

reviews.headline: Best oil control moisturizer
reviews.comments: After, buying tons of high to low end mosturizer for oil skin over the years. This product is the only one that has control my super oily skin. Love it üòçüòç

reviews.headline: Oil Control is AMAZING
reviews.comments: I have been using this for over month now and the difference that it has made on my skin is incredible. I love not having overly oily skin after applying.

reviews.headline: Best oil-control I've come across
reviews.comments: I have extremely oily skin. Within an hour of washing my face, I develop a thick film of oil. This has been a godsend. It feels fresh and light on my face. The only caveat to this is that I sometimes flake a little around my eyebrows/nostrils and this doesnt really do enough to settle that down. Otherwise, it's amazing!

reviews.headline: The Best
reviews.comments: I have really oily skin, I've tried everything, but nothing helped with the shine and oil. This stuff is amazing!! It doesnt dry me out and it controls the shine while leaving my face soft and smooth!

reviews.headline: I love it.
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is amazing , it really control my oily skin very good.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail
reviews.comments:
*I'm a true oily skin girly‚Äînot combo, just straight-up OILYYY!*

Prior to using this, after finishing my skincare routine, my face would get oily within an hour or two. I was using CeraVe's regular lotion. While it's hydrating, it's way too thick for daytime, and I'd end up super greasy. 

But with THIS, it's been a total game-changer for ME. The improvement in sebum control is unreal. The morning after using it, my skin feels hydrated with barely any sebum‚Äîlike, my skin is looking NORMAL üòá. (I have been using this for about 2 months now and i'm obssesed).

Here's the trick with the Oil Control Moisturizer: work on one section of your face at a time since it dries quickly. I start with my forehead and then work my way down. Total lifesaver!

reviews.headline: Like wearing a mask
reviews.comments: The product dries into a thin layer on your face which feels like wax or film. The oil control claim must come from the oil being held between this thin film that never absorbed and your skin. My face looked like I had never washed it and it was super oily.

reviews.headline: Doesn't control my oily face at all
reviews.comments: My face is shiny within 2 hrs of washing my face and applying this moisturizer. I work from home, so this happens without my even going outside in the Houston heat. I took pics of my oul absorbing sheets, but this review platform doesn't allow me to upload pics. Waste of my money as far as I'm concerned.

reviews.headline: Actually controls oil
reviews.comments: I think I finally found the perfect face moisturizer for me. I use it morning and night and have noticed my face less oily throughout the day. it doesn't feel like there's something on your face which I really like. very light and absorbs nicely.

Prior to using this, after finishing my skincare routine, my face would get oily within an hour or two. I was using CeraVe's regular lotion. While it's hydrating, it's way too thick for daytime, and I'd end up super greasy.
